body:
Since it's Summer I thought I might as well do one too.

A little bit about me:
I'm from an area in/around London.
I'm 16 years old.
I've played on this server for 3 years when November ends.
I'm obsessed with swimming. xD
I like rock music, especially alternative rock.
I've been a staff member since December.
My name is James (dun dun dun!).
I have a deep voice (yes, I know I sound like a 40-50 year old, Sayah, but that's why my voice is so sexy).

Phew!


Fire away!

replies.body:
One of the nicest and funniest people I've ever met. xD I've known you for a while now, and you're probably one of the best people on this server personality wise. Don't ever change, mate. :)

Not a clue. I think we'll end up leaving, and I kind of hope we do, but I'm torn between remain and leave.

replies.body:
Hey MyWorld, will you powerMyWorld for me? c; I think my signature memory of you is that you'd often OFTEN NOT ALWAYS beat me on Nexus when it was being played. Dang you were good. Anyway... questions!

  1. Are you wearing socks right now?
  2. What is the longest you have gone without sleep?
  3. Have you ever been stung by a bee?
  4. What is your favourite breakfast food?
  5. Are you still learning who you are?
  6. Glass half full or half empty? Or is the glass just malformed?
  7. What was your impression of me?
  8. What's the best compliment you have received?
Keep up your amazing work as moderator! Have a good one! :D

Take it easy, - Aura

replies.body:
Awww, I remember that too. I'll get back to that level some day! <3



  1. No. Too cool for socks.
  2. A whole night. Somehow, I was still awake in the morning...
  3. No. Now I'm going to get stung...
  4. Cereal! :D
  5. Yep. Still don't have a clue, and probably won't for a long time.
  6. Neither. Some lightweight couldn't finish the rest.
  7. When you were a staff member, I always thought you were a very good mod. :) You're funny, nice and one of the people I've known for longest on this.
  8. "Myworld, have my babies". 
Thanks! :D

replies.body:
Cool guy. Funny, nice and patient. You, Rese, Sayah and Lokigh (yes, I didn't forget you, Lokigh) are amongst my closest friends. Come back soon!

It has the potential to be a great team, just more scrims against our own team members are needed.

Yes, although sometimes I do get tired off all of the staff drama and arguments. Still, it's nice to give back to a server that's given me so much.

James. :) :P

For me!
